description: The Gladius Hispaniensis was originally a sword used by the Iberians in what is now known as Spain. The Romans adopted it after coming into military contact with the Iberians during the Second Punic War.
requirementsTooltip: Unlocked in City Phase. Requires “Forging” or “Metallurgy.”
tooltip: All sword units +20% hack attack, but +5 metal cost.
